aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.description: Driving innovation and excellence in the digital realm.
aboutPage.companyDetails: YOUR DIGITAL CHOICE is a forward-thinking technology firm dedicated to crafting bespoke digital solutions that drive growth and efficiency. Our mission is to empower businesses by leveraging cutting-edge technology, deep industry expertise, and a passion for innovation. We believe in building long-term partnerships, turning complex challenges into powerful opportunities for our clients.

services.title: Our A to Z Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your digital business needs.

items.title: Alibaba Services (A to Z)
items.description: Complete supplier research, sourcing, and logistics management.
items.detailedDescription: Our comprehensive Alibaba services cover everything from supplier verification to shipment coordination. We help you navigate the complex world of international sourcing with confidence and efficiency.
features: Supplier Research & Verification: Thorough vetting of suppliers to ensure reliability and quality
Product Sourcing & Quotation: Finding the best products at competitive prices
Factory Audit & Quality Inspection: On-site inspections to ensure quality standards
Custom Branding & Private Label Setup: Complete branding solutions for your products
Shipment & Logistics Coordination: End-to-end shipping and logistics management
Trade Assurance & Payment Management: Secure payment processing and trade protection
Alibaba Store Setup & Optimization: Professional store setup and optimization
Custom Order Management System: Streamlined order processing and tracking

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and process.

questions.question: What e-commerce platforms do you specialize in?
questions.answer: We specialize in all major e-commerce platforms including Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Shopify, WooCommerce, and Alibaba. Our team has extensive experience managing stores and optimizing performance across these platforms.

questions.question: Do you provide end-to-end e-commerce solutions?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide complete A to Z solutions including product sourcing, store setup, inventory management, marketing, customer service, and analytics. We handle every aspect of your e-commerce business.

questions.question: How do you ensure the quality of suppliers on Alibaba?
questions.answer: We conduct thorough supplier verification including factory audits, quality inspections, and trade assurance verification. Our team has established relationships with verified suppliers to ensure quality and reliability.

questions.question: What kind of results can I expect from your advertising services?
questions.answer: Results vary based on industry and competition, but our clients typically see 20-40% improvement in ROAS within the first 3 months. We provide detailed analytics and regular performance reports.

questions.question: Do you offer training and support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training, SOP creation, and ongoing support. Our team training services help you understand the processes and manage operations effectively.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to YOUR DIGITAL CHOICE. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

sections.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: Other than the content you own, under these Terms, YOUR DIGITAL CHOICE and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website.

sections.title: 3. Restrictions
sections.content: You are specifically restricted from publishing any Website material in any other media; selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise commercializing any Website material without permission.

sections.title: 4. Your Content
sections.content: By displaying Your Content, you grant YOUR DIGITAL CHOICE a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any media.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall YOUR DIGITAL CHOICE be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this Website.

sections.title: 6. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
sections.content: These Terms will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you request a quote, subscribe to our newsletter, or otherwise communicate with us.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, and to communicate with you about our offerings.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse and unauthorized access.

sections.title: 5. Your Choices
sections.content: You may opt out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the instructions in those emails.

sections.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may change this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy.
